name: MLImageClassifier.CustomFeatureExtractor
desc: A custom feature extractor a training session uses to train an image classifier.

items.name: init(modelPath: URL, outputName: String?)
items.desc: Creates a custom feature extractor given a model file and an optional output layer name.

items.name: var modelPath: URL
items.desc: The location of a neural network .mlmodel file that takes an image as an input.

items.name: var outputName: String?
items.desc: The name of the output from a feature extraction layer within the model.
